channel.title: LOTS of questions, most about NPCs
channel.description:
Ok... No cussing please, I'm just a confused, unsatisfied little kid
;) I have taken most tuts, I'm still confused and unsatisfied.
I would prefer that you answer each question seperatley, thanks
~~~~~~NUMBER 6 IS TOP PRIOITY, IF YOU ARE GONNA ANSWER~~~~~~
1. Why, oh why, do all my npcs have 0 FREAKING HP
2. Why does it make my computer crash when I try to equip an obisidian cape, among other things??
3. How do I alter my stats???
4. Why, if I change status to Jagex Mod, CAN'T I ENTER CODES??
5. How do I alter my look???
6. How do I modify shops?
That's it, I will probably add more though.

item.title: LOTS of questions, most about NPCs
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

  1. open your npc.cfg files an set hp to what you ish…
  2. its glitched in other words your server doesnt recognize the item…
  3. open your character files, then open it up, go to skills, and set xp::
    ex::
    character-skill = 0 42 set xp to what you wish…
  4. go to your character files, set your rights to number 2…
    5.type ::char
    6.shops.cfg

goodluck and have fun… make sure to save and compile…

Read full topic
item.source: LOTS of questions, most about NPCs
